<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXHIBIT
A</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">MASTER
LEASE</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\nogwal\04-13437-3\task256611\13437-3-kc.htm',USER='nogwal',CD='Dec 17 08:16 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">THIRD AMENDMENT TO DEED OF LEASE AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS THIRD AMENDMENT TO DEED OF LEASE AGREEMENT dated as of December 14,
2004 (this &#147;<u>Amendment</u>&#148;) by and between MORE APPLIED FOUR (DE) LLC, a
Delaware limited liability company (&#147;<u>Landlord</u>&#148;) and APW NORTH AMERICA
INC., a Delaware corporation (&#147;<u>Tenant</u>&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">BACKGROUND:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; POWER (DE) QRS
14-34, INC. (&#147;<u>Original Landlord</u>&#148;) and Tenant entered into a Deed of
Lease Agreement dated as of May 30, 2000, as amended by a First Amendment to
Deed of Lease Agreement dated as of July 31, 2000 and a Second Amendment to
Deed of Lease Agreement dated as of October 31, 2001 (said Deed of Lease
Agreement as amended by said First Amendment, the &#147;<u>Lease</u>&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">B.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; By Assignment and
Assumption of Lease Agreement, dated October &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, 2001, Original
Landlord assigned to Landlord all of its right, title and interest in and to
the Lease and Landlord assumed all of the Original Landlord&#146;s obligations and
liabilities thereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">C.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Landlord and Tenant
desire to amend the Lease as hereinafter set forth.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, for good and valuable consideration, Landlord and
Tenant covenant and agree as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Paragraph 5(6) of
the Lease is hereby deleted.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; All references to
the term &#147;Renewal Term&#148; in the lease are hereby deleted.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Notwithstanding
anything to the contrary in Paragraph 34 of the Lease, Tenant shall not have
any option to purchase the New Jersey Premises pursuant to Paragraph 34 of the
Lease.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Landlord hereby
gives its consent to Tenant to execute and deliver that certain Sublease (the &#147;<u>ABNH
Sublease</u>&#148;) by and between Tenant and American Bank Note Holographics, Inc.
dated as of December 14, 2004 with respect to the New Jersey Premises and
agrees that, with respect to the execution and delivery by Tenant of the ABNH
Sublease only, the requirement that Tenant deposit with Landlord a Sublease
Security Deposit shall be waived.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; So long as the ABNH
Sublease is in effect, Paragraph 16 of the Lease shall be modified as follows
(with respect to the insurance carried on the New Jersey Premises <u>only</u>):</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Tenant
shall not be required to obtain and maintain (i) Incidental Medical Malpractice
and Host Liquor Liability Insurance, (ii) Excess Liability insurance with
limits greater that $3,000,000 per occurrence/annual aggregate or (iii)
insurance for Off-Premises Service Interruption, Expediting Expenses, Ammonia
Contamination or Hazardous Materials Clean-Up Expense.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The
requirement contained in the last sentence of Paragraph 16(a)(v)
is hereby waived.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\nogwal\04-13437-3\task256611\13437-3-kc.htm',USER='nogwal',CD='Dec 17 08:16 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The
requirement contained in the penultimate sentence of Paragraph 16(b) to name
Landlord as the insured on the insurance required under Paragraph 16(a)(v) of the Lease is hereby modified to name Landlord as the
additional insured</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The
requirement contained in the first sentence of Paragraph 16(h) to name Landlord
and its lender as the named insureds with respect to concurrent or contributing
insurance is hereby modified to name Landlord and its lender as the additional
insureds; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; In
conjunction with Paragraph 16(i), Owner hereby waives all of its rights of
subrogation against the Tenant as may be applicable to any insurer and will
enforce such waivers in policy provisions.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Except as
specifically amended herein, the terms and conditions of the Lease shall remain
in full force and effect and binding upon the parties hereto.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Any capitalized
terms not defined herein shall have the meanings assigned in the Lease.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[NO FURTHER TEXT APPEARS ON THIS PAGE]</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>

be duly executed under seal as of the day first above written.</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">CONSENT OF LENDER</font></u></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The undersigned, as the servicer with respect to that certain mortgage
loan made by Morgan Stanley Dean Witter Mortgage Capital Inc. to More Applied
Four (DE) LLC on October 31, 2001 in the original principal amount of
$11,070,524, which loan is secured by the property that is the subject of the
Lease, hereby consents to the execution and delivery by Borrower of the
preceding Third Amendment to Deed of Lease and consents .</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">CONSENTED TO:</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="18%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:18.96%;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:100.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Sarah J. Burns</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

  <td width="100%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:100.0%;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ASSIGNMENT AND ASSUMPTION OF DEED OF LEASE AGREEMENT</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; THIS ASSIGNMENT AND ASSUMPTION OF DEED OF
LEASE AGREEMENT (the &#147;<u>Assignment</u>&#148;) is made and entered into as of
October __, 2001, by and between POWER (DE) QRS 14-34, INC., a Delaware
corporation (&#147;<u>Assignor</u>&#148;) and
MORE APPLIED FOUR (DE) LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (&#147;<u>Assignee</u>&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; WHEREAS, Assignor is the lessor under that
certain Deed of Lease Agreement (the &#147;<u>Original Lease</u>&#148;), dated May 30,
2000, by and between Assignor and APW NORTH AMERICA INC., a Delaware
corporation, as lessee (&#147;<u>Tenant</u>&#148;), a memorandum of which was recorded in
the County of White, State of Indiana on June 6, 2000 as Document No.
000602934, in the County of Hennepin, State of Minnesota on July 10, 2000 as
Document No. 3294306, and in the County of Mercer, State of New Jersey on June
2, 2000 in Book 3831, Page 50 (collectively, the &#147;<u>Memoranda</u>&#148;), and
thereafter Assignor and Tenant executed a First Amendment to Deed of Lease
Agreement dated as of July 31, 2000 (the &#147;<u>First Amendment</u>&#148;; the Original
Lease, as amended by the First Amendment, collectively the &#147;<u>Lease</u>&#148;)
affecting properties located at Monon, Indiana, Champlin, Minnesota,
Robbinsville, New Jersey and Radford, Virginia (collectively, the &#147;<u>Premises</u>&#148;), as described on Exhibit A
attached hereto and made a part hereof;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; WHEREAS, Assignor desires to assign all of
its right, title and interest in and to the Lease and the Memoranda to
Assignee, and Assignee desires to accept the assignment thereof, upon the terms
and conditions set forth herein;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the
mutual agreements herein contained, and other good and valuable consideration,
the receipt and sufficiency which are hereby acknowledged, Assignor and
Assignee hereby covenant and agree, effective as of
the date hereof, as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Assignment</u>.&#160; Assignor hereby assigns, transfers, and
conveys to Assignee all of Assignor&#146;s right, title, and interest as landlord in
and to the Lease and the Memoranda, and all of the rights, benefits and
privileges of the tenant thereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Representations
and Warranties</u>.&#160; Assignor represents
and warrants to Assignee that the Lease is in full force and effect and that
Assignor has not previously assigned or encumbered its interest in the
leasehold estate represented by the Lease or the Memoranda.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Indemnity
by Assignor</u>.&#160; Assignor shall
indemnify, pay, protect, defend and hold Assignee harmless from any claim,
liability, cost or expense (including without limitation reasonable attorneys&#146;
fees and costs) arising out of any obligation or liability of Assignor as
landlord under the Lease arising or accruing prior to the date hereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Assumption</u>.&#160; Assignee hereby assumes all liabilities and
obligations of Assignor under the Lease and the Memoranda which arise on or after
the date hereof and agrees </font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\nogwal\04-13437-3\task256611\13437-3-kc.htm',USER='nogwal',CD='Dec 17 08:16 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to</font> perform all
obligations of Assignor under the Lease which are to be performed or which
become due on or after the date hereof.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Indemnity by Assignee</u>.&#160; Assignee shall indemnify, pay, protect,
defend and hold Assignor harmless from any claim, liability, cost or expense
(including without limitation reasonable attorneys&#146; fees) arising out of (a)
any obligation or liability of the landlord under the Lease which is to be
performed or which becomes due after the date hereof or (b) any obligation or
liability of the landlord under the Lease relating to acts or omissions of
Assignee occurring after the date hereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Further Assurances</u>.&#160; Assignor covenants with Assignee and Assignee
covenants with Assignor that each will execute or procure any additional
documents necessary to establish the rights of the other party hereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Governing Law</u>.&#160;
This Assignment shall be governed by the laws of the States where the
Premises are located, without giving effect to its principles of conflicts of
law.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Binding Effect</u>.&#160;
The provisions of this Assignment shall inure to the benefit of, and be
binding upon, the parties hereto and their respective heirs, legal
representatives, successors and assigns.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Counterparts</u>.&#160;
This Assignment may be executed in any number of and by different
parties hereto on separate counterparts, all of which, when so executed, shall
be deemed an original, but all such counterparts shall constitute one and the
same agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[<b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">signature</font></i></b><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;"> page follows immediately</font></i></b>]</font></u></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Assignor and Assignee
have executed this Assignment and Assumption of Deed of Lease Agreement as of
the date and year first written above.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

 <tr>
  <td width="49%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:49.24%;">
  <p style="margin:0in -.25in .0001pt 0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>

<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EXHIBIT A</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in -31.5pt .0001pt 0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in .1in 12.0pt 0in;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">PROPERTY
DESCRIPTIONS</font></u></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in .1in 12.0pt 0in;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in .1in 12.0pt 0in;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">INDIANA</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">TRACT 1</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">That part of the West Half of the Northwest Quarter of Section 21,
Township 28 North, Range 4 West in Monon Township,
White County, Indiana, described by:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">COMMENCING at the Northwest corner of the above said Section 21;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE South 86 degrees 27 minutes East along
the Section line 253.5 feet;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE South 02 degrees 42 minutes West 331.2 feet to the Point of
Beginning;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE South 85 degrees 47 minutes East 341.85 feet;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE South 02 degrees 30 minutes West 315.53 feet;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE South 85 degrees 54 minutes East&#160; 438.48 feet;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE South 05 degrees 13 minutes West 745.30 feet to the North
right-of-way line of the L. and N. Railroad;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE along said line North 62 degrees 09 minutes West 222.37 feet,
South 67 degrees 48 minutes West 119.02 feet, North 63 degrees 36 minutes West
100.09 feet and North 61 degrees 08 minutes West 357.00 feet;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE North 00 degrees 51 minutes East 838.26 feet to the Point of
Beginning.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">TRACT II</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">That part of the Northwest Quarter of the Northwest Quarter of Section
21, Township 28 North, Range 4 West in Monon Township,
White County, Indiana, described by:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">COMMENCING at the Northwest corner of the above said Section 21;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE South 86 degrees 27 minutes East 253.5 feet to the Point of
Beginning;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE South 85 degrees 45 minutes East 340.7 feet;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE South 02 degrees 30 minutes West 331.0 feet;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE North 85 degrees 47 minutes West 341.85 feet;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE North 02 degrees 42 minutes East 331.2 feet to the Point of
Beginning.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This parcel of land also described as followed:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A parcel of land, beginning at a point Sixteen (16) Rods East of the
Northwest corner of Section Twenty-one (21), Township Twenty-eight (28) North,
Range Four (4) West, White County, Indiana, on the section line between Section
Sixteen (16) and Twenty-one (21);</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">RUNNING THENCE East Twenty (20) Rods;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE South Three Hundred Thirty (330) feet;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE West Twenty (20) Rods;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE North Three Hundred Thirty (330) feet to the place of BEGINNING;
this tract being out of the Northwest Quarter of the Northwest Quarter of
Section Twenty-one (21), Township Twenty-eight (28) North, Range
Four (4) West, and in the above said County and State,</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .1in 12.0pt 0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EXCEPT that part of the above described lands
as has been sold to the county and state for right-of-way for a State Road.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .1in 12.0pt 0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in .1in 12.0pt 0in;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">MINNESOTA</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Lot 1, Block 1, Westwood North 3<sup>rd</sup> Addition, excepting that
part thereof lying northerly of the following described line:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">BEGINNING at a point on the North line of Section 31, Township 120
North, Range 21 West, Distant 237.03 feet Easterly of the North Quarter corner
thereof;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE run Southerly at an angle of 90 degrees
00 minutes 00 seconds from said North Section line for 45 feet;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THENCE run Westerly parallel with said North Section line of 150 feet
and there terminating, Hennepin County, Minnesota.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Torrens Property</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Certificate of Title No. 811285.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The above property is situated in Hennepin County, State of Minnesota.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Address:&#160; 11611 Business Park
Blvd. N., Champlin, MN 55316</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .1in 6.0pt 0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Tax Map or Parcel ID No.:&#160; 31-120-21 12 0073</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .1in 12.0pt 0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in .1in 12.0pt 0in;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NEW JERSEY</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">All that certain lot, piece or parcel of land, with the buildings and
improvements thereon erected, situate, lying and being in the Township of
Washington, County of Mercer, State of New Jersey:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">BEGINNING at a point in the proposed Easterly right of way line of West
Manor Way (40 feet from centerline) said point being located the following two
(2) courses from the intersection of the southeasterly right of way line of New
Jersey Turnpike (300 feet wide) with the Easterly right of way line of West
Manor Way (50 feet wide) and from said intersection running;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Southerly distant
3202.78 feet along the Easterly right of way line of West Manor Way (50 feet
wide) to a point; thence</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; South 54 degrees 52
minutes 51 seconds East along the common line between Tax Map Lots 19 and 20 in
Block 41, 15.00 feet to the point and place of beginning and running thence;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\nogwal\04-13437-3\task256611\13437-3-kc.htm',USER='nogwal',CD='Dec 17 08:16 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; North 34 degrees 24
minutes 41 seconds East along the proposed Easterly
right of way line of West Manor Way, 820.19 feet to a point of curvature;
thence</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Northeasterly along
a new line through Lot 19 in Block 41, along a curve to the right having a
radius of 40.00 feet and an arc length of 62.83 feet to a point of tangency;
thence</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; South 55 degrees 35
minutes 19 seconds East along same, 245.00 feet to a point; thence</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; South 57 degrees 44
minutes 10 seconds East still along same, 200.14 feet
to a point; thence</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; South 55 degrees 35
minutes 19 seconds East still along same, 168.13 feet
to a point; thence</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; South 34 degrees 24
minutes 41 seconds West still along same, 875.76 feet
to a point; thence</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; North 54 degrees 52
minutes 51 seconds West along the common line between
Tax Map Lots 19 and 20 in Block 41, 653.18 feet to the true point and place of
BEGINNING.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Being known as Lot 19.02 in Block 41 on the Tax Map.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">TOGETHER WITH the benefits as contained in
that certain Cross Easement Agreement recorded in Deed Book 3186, page 024.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .1in 12.0pt 0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .1in 12.0pt 0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in .1in 12.0pt 0in;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">VIRGINIA</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Parcel containing 14.771 acres
as shown on plat entitled &#147;Plat of Survey of 14.771 acres to be acquired by
Aspen Motion Technologies, Inc., from the City of Radford Industrial
Development Authority,&#148; dated November 11, 1998, and revised November 25, 1998
and January 5, 1999, made by Anderson and Associates, Inc.,
Engineers-Surveyors-Planners, of record in the Clerk&#146;s Office of the Circuit
Court of the City of Radford, Virginia, in Plat Book 4, Page 76.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\nogwal\04-13437-3\task256611\13437-3-kc.htm',USER='nogwal',CD='Dec 17 08:16 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECOND AMENDMENT TO DEED OF LEASE AGREEMENT</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS SECOND AMENDMENT TO DEED OF LEASE AGREEMENT dated as of October 31,
2001 (the &#147;<u>Second Amendment</u>&#148;) by and between MORE APPLIED FOUR (DE) LLC,
a Delaware limited liability company (&#147;<u>Landlord</u>&#148;) and APW NORTH AMERICA
INC., A Delaware corporation (&#147;<u>Tenant</u>&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">BACKGROUND:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; POWER (DE) QRS
14-34, INC. (&#147;<u>Original Landlord</u>&#148;) and Tenant entered into a Deed of
Lease Agreement dated as of May 30, 2000, as amended by a First Amendment to
Deed of Lease Agreement dated as of July 31, 2000 (said Deed of Lease Agreement
as amended by said First Amendment, the &#147;<u>Lease</u>&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">B.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; By Assignment and
Assumption of Lease Agreement, dated October &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, 2001, Original
Landlord assigned to Landlord all of its right, title and interest in and to
the Lease and Landlord assumed all of the Original Landlord&#146;s obligations and
liabilities thereunder..</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">C.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Landlord and Tenant
desire to amend the Lease as hereinafter set forth.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, for good and valuable consideration, Landlord and
Tenant covenant and agree as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Paragraph 34 <u>Option
to Purchase</u> is hereby deleted in its entirety and the following is inserted
in lieu thereof:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;34.&#160; <u>Option</u><u> to Purchase</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Landlord
does hereby give and grant to Tenant the option (the &#147;<u>Option</u>&#148;) to
purchase the Leased Premises or any one or more of the Related Premises (any
such Related Premises, the &#147;<u>Sale Premises</u>&#148;) (i) for a purchase price
(the &#147;<u>Purchase Price</u>&#148;) equal to the Offer Amount and (ii) from time to
time on any date (the &#147;<u>Option Purchase Date</u>&#148;) (A) within the thirty (30)
day period prior to December 1, 2011 (the &#147;<u>First Option</u>&#148;) or, (B) if the
First Option is not exercised with respect to all of the Leased Premises,
within the thirty (30) day period prior to December 1, 2014 and/or June 1, 2017
(each, a &#147;<u>Remaining Option</u>&#148;), in any case if and only if this Lease is
then in full force and effect and with respect to the exercise of any Remaining
Option only if Tenant provides to Landlord such documentation as Landlord shall
reasonably require to evidence the exercise of the Automatic Renewal. Any
Option Purchase Date shall be mutually agreeable to Landlord and Tenant.&#160; If Tenant intends to exercise either the
First Option or either Remaining Option, Tenant shall give written notice (&#147;<u>Option
Exercise Notice</u>&#148;) to Landlord that it is making an irrevocable exercise not
later than six (6) months prior to the applicable Option Purchase Date.&#160; Promptly upon receipt of the Option Exercise
Notice by Landlord (which shall identify the Sale Premises or Leased Premises
to be purchased), the parties shall commence to determine Fair Market Value of
the Leased Premises or Sale Premises, as applicable.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; If
Tenant shall exercise the Option to purchase the Leased Premises or Sale
Premises, then, if on the applicable Option Purchase Date Tenant has paid the
Purchase Price and has satisfied all other Monetary Obligations that have
accrued prior to the Option Purchase Date, Landlord shall convey title to the
Leased Premises or the Sale Premises, as applicable, to Tenant in accordance
with Paragraph 20 hereof; provided that if an Event of Default has occurred and
is continuing on the Option Purchase Date, Landlord, at its sole option, may
terminate the First Option and, if</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\nogwal\04-13437-3\task256611\13437-3-kc.htm',USER='nogwal',CD='Dec 17 08:16 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">applicable</font>, the
Remaining Options.&#160; IF THIS LEASE SHALL
TERMINATE FOR ANY REASON PRIOR TO THE DATE ORIGINALLY FIXED HEREIN FOR THE
EXPIRATION OF THE TERM, OR IF TENANT SHALL FAIL TO GIVE THE AFORESAID OPTION
EXERCISE NOTICE WITH RESPECT TO THE FIRST OPTION AND, IF APPLICABLE, THE
REMAINING OPTIONS BY THE REQUIRED DATE, TIME BEING OF THE ESSENCE, THE FIRST
OPTION OR, IF APPLICABLE, THE REMAINING OPTIONS PROVIDED IN THIS PARAGRAPH 34
AND ANY EXERCISE THEREOF BY TENANT SHALL CEASE AND TERMINATE AND SHALL BE NULL
AND VOID.&#160; IN SUCH EVENT TENANT SHALL
EXECUTE A QUITCLAIM DEED AND SUCH OTHER DOCUMENTS AS LANDLORD SHALL REASONABLY
REQUEST EVIDENCING THE TERMINATION OF THE FIRST OPTION AND, IF APPLICABLE, THE
REMAINING OPTION.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; If
Tenant shall purchase fewer than all of the Leased Premises, this Lease shall
remain in full force and effect with respect to the Remaining Premises;
provided that the Basic Rent for the Remaining Premises to be paid after
termination of this Lease with respect to the Sale Premises shall be the Basic
Rent otherwise payable with respect to the Leased Premises multiplied by a
percentage equal to the sum of the percentages for each of the Remaining
Premises set forth on Exhibit &#147;F&#148; attached hereto.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Upon the funding of
the initial Loan, the Initial Annual Basic Rent as adjusted by the Initial
Adjustment shall be One Million Nine Hundred Thirty-four Thousand Three Hundred
Thirty-five and 07/100 ($1,934,335.07) and the Initial Monthly Installment
shall be One Hundred Sixty-one Thousand One Hundred Ninety-four and 59/100
($161,194.59) Dollars.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Except as specifically
amended herein, the terms and conditions of the Lease shall remain in full
force and effect and binding upon the parties hereto.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Any capitalized
terms not defined herein shall have the meanings assigned in the Lease.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Landlord and Tenant have caused this Second
Amendment to be duly executed under seal as of the day first above written.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="49%" colspan="7" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="49%" colspan="7" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">APW NORTH AMERICA INC.,<br>
  a Delaware corporation</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.58%;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">FIRST AMENDMENT TO DEED OF LEASE AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">THIS FIRST AMENDMENT TO DEED OF LEASE
AGREEMENT </font></b>(&#147;Amendment&#148;) is made and executed as of July
31, 2000 by and between POWER (DE) QRS 14-34, INC. (&#147;<u>Landlord</u>&#148;), a
Delaware corporation, with an address of c/o W. P. Carey &amp; Co. LLC, 50
Rockefeller Plaza, 2<sup>nd</sup> Floor, New York, New York 10022, and APW
NORTH AMERICA INC., a Delaware corporation (&#147;<u>Tenant</u>&#148;), with an address
at N22 W23685 Ridgeview Parkway West, Waukesha, Wisconsin&#160; 53188-1013.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WITNESSETH:</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, pursuant to
the terms of that certain Deed of Lease Agreement dated May 30, 2000 (the &#147;<u>Lease</u>&#148;),
Landlord leased to Tenant and Tenant leased from Landlord certain properties
situate in Monon, Indiana, Champlin, Minnesota, Robbinsville, New Jersey, and
Radford, Virginia; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, pursuant to
the terms of that certain Guaranty and Suretyship Agreement dated May 30, 2000
(the &#147;Guaranty&#148;), Applied Power Inc. and Wright Line Inc. guaranteed to and
became surety for all of the obligations of Tenant under the Lease;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, Paragraph
4.14 of the Guaranty provides for the execution and delivery by APW LTD. of a
new guaranty and suretyship agreement upon the closing of the contemplated
spin-off (the &#147;Spin-Off&#148;) of the electronics and enclosure business from
Applied Power Inc., which guaranty shall replace the Guaranty of Wright Line
Inc. and shall bind APW LTD. to all of the terms and conditions set forth in
the Guaranty;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, in
connection with the Spin-Off, APW LTD. has executed a guaranty of even date
herewith whereby APW LTD. shall be the guarantor and surety for all of the
obligations of Tenant under the Lease; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>,
Landlord and Tenant desire to modify and amend the Lease to reflect the
foregoing.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NOW, THEREFORE</font></b>,
incorporating the recitals hereinabove set forth by reference and intending to
be legally bound hereby, and in consideration of the mutual covenants contained
herein and other good and valuable consideration, the receipt whereof is hereby
acknowledged, the parties hereto covenant and agree as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The defined term &#147;Guarantor&#148;
in Paragraph 2 of the Lease is hereby deleted in its entirety and the following
is inserted in lieu thereof:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;&#145;Guarantor&#146; shall mean APW LTD., a Bermuda corporation.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The defined term &#147;Guaranty&#148;
in Paragraph 2 of the Lease is hereby deleted in its entirety and the following
is inserted in lieu thereof:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;&#145;Guaranty&#146; shall mean the Guaranty and Suretyship Agreement, dated &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
2000, from Guarantor to Landlord guaranteeing the payment and performance by
Tenant of all of Tenant&#146;s obligations under the Lease.&#148;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\nogwal\04-13437-3\task256611\13437-3-kc.htm',USER='nogwal',CD='Dec 17 08:16 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Except as expressly
set forth herein, nothing herein is intended to or shall be deemed to modify or
amend any of the other terms or provisions of the Lease.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; All undefined
capitalized terms used herein shall have the same meanings as set forth in the
Lease.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; This Amendment may
be executed in any number of and by different parties hereto on separate
counterparts, all of which, when so executed, shall be deemed an original, but
all such counterparts shall constitute one and the same agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; This Consent to
Sublease and the Lease together contain the entire understanding between the
parties hereto and supersedes all prior agreements and understandings, if any,
relating to the subject matter hereof or thereof.&#160; Any promises, representations, warranties or
guarantees not herein or therein contained and hereinafter made shall have no
force and effect unless in writing, and executed by the party or parties making
such representations, warranties or guarantees.&#160;
Neither this Amendment nor the Lease nor any portion or provisions
hereof or thereof may be changed, modified, amended, waived, supplemented,
discharged, cancelled or terminated orally or by any course of dealing, or in
any manner other than by an agreement in writing, signed by the party to be
charged.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[THE REMAINDER OF THIS PAGE LEFT
INTENTIONALLY BLANK]</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF</font></b>,
the Parties hereto intending to be legally bound and to so bind their
respective representatives, successors and assigns, set their hands and seals
the day and year first above written.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">DEED OF
LEASE AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">by</font>
and between</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">POWER (DE) QRS 14-34, INC.,<br>
a Delaware corporation</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">as</font>
LANDLORD</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">and</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">APW NORTH AMERICA INC.,</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a</font>
Delaware corporation,</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">as</font>
TENANT</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Premises: Monon, Indiana</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Champlin, Minnesota</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Robbinsville/Washington
Township, New Jersey</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Radford, Virginia</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; DEED OF LEASE
AGREEMENT, made as of this 30th day of May, 2000, between POWER (DE) QRS 14-34,
INC., a Delaware corporation (&#147;<u>Landlord</u>&#148;), with an address c/o W.P.
Carey &amp; Co., Inc., 50 Rockefeller Plaza, 2nd Floor, New York, New York
10020, and APW NORTH AMERICA INC., a Delaware corporation (&#147;T<u>enant</u>&#148;),
with an address at N22 W23685 Ridgeview Parkway West, Waukesha, Wisconsin
53188-1013..</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In consideration of the rents and provisions
herein stipulated to be paid and performed, Landlord and Tenant hereby covenant
and agree as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="DemiseOfPremises"><u>Demise
of Premises</u></a>.&#160; Landlord hereby
demises and lets to Tenant, and Tenant hereby takes and leases from Landlord,
for the term and upon the provisions hereinafter specified, the following
described property (hereinafter referred to collectively as the &#147;<u>Leased
Premises</u>&#148; and individually as the &#147;Indiana Premises&#148;, &#147;Minnesota Premises&#148;,
&#147;New Jersey Premises&#148; and &#147;Virginia Premises&#148; each of which premises shall
include the portions of items (a), (b) and (c) of this Paragraph 1 located
thereon or therein and appertaining thereto):&#160;
(a) the premises described in <u>Exhibit &#147;A&#148;</u> hereto, together with
the Appurtenances (collectively, the &#147;<u>Land</u>&#148;); (b) the buildings,
structures and other improvements now or hereafter constructed on the Land (collectively,
the &#147;<u>Improvements</u>&#148;); and (c) the fixtures, machinery, equipment and
other property described in <u>Exhibit &#147;B&#148;</u> hereto (collectively, the &#147;<u>Equipment</u>&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="CertainDefinitions"><u>Certain
Definitions</u></a>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Acquisition Cost&#148; of each of
the Related Premises shall mean the amount set forth opposite such premises on <u>Exhibit
&#147;E&#148;</u> hereto.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Additional Rent&#148; shall mean
Additional Rent as defined in Paragraph 7.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Adjoining Property&#148; shall mean
all sidewalks, driveways, curbs, gores and vault spaces adjoining any of the
Leased Premises.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Affected Premises&#148; shall mean
the Affected Premises as defined in Paragraph 18.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Alterations&#148; shall mean all
changes, additions or improvements to, all alterations, reconstructions,
renewals, replacements or removals of and all substitutions or replacements for
any of the Improvements or Equipment, both interior
and exterior, structural and non-structural, and ordinary and extraordinary.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Appurtenances&#148; shall mean all
tenements, hereditaments, easements, rights-of-way, rights, privileges in and
to the Land, including (a) easements over other lands granted by any Easement
Agreement and (b) any streets, ways, alleys, vaults, gores or strips of land
adjoining the Land.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Assignment&#148; shall mean any
assignment of rents and leases from Landlord to a Lender which (a) encumbers
any of the Leased Premises and (b) secures Landlord&#146;s obligation to repay a
Loan, as the same may be amended, supplemented or modified from time to time.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Assignment Security Deposit&#148;
shall mean Assignment Security Deposit as defined in Paragraph 35(f).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Authority&#148; shall mean
Authority as defined in Paragraph 22(a).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
