<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;As used
herein, the term &#147;Adjusted FMRV&#148; shall mean the greater of (i) 97% of the Fair
Market Rental Value (as defined herein) of the Premises per annum or (ii) the
Prior Bumped Rent (as defined herein).&#160;
The &#147;Prior Bumped Rent&#148; as used herein shall mean the lesser of (1)
amount that is 1.89% greater than the per annum rent payable under the Sublease
immediately prior to the applicable Renewal Term (which, notwithstanding
anything contained herein to the contrary, shall be deemed to be</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='9',FILE='C:\JMS\ctaft\04-13437-3\task258213\13437-3-kd.htm',USER='ctaft',CD='Dec 20 12:24 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$707,696.03 per annum for the purposes of calculating the Fair Market
Rental Value for the first Renewal Term) or (2) 110% of the Fair Market Rental
Value of the Premises per annum.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&#148;Fair
Market Rental Value&#148; shall be determined as of the date occurring sixteen (16) months
prior to the applicable Renewal Date (such date is hereinafter called the &#147;Determination
Date&#148;) and which determination shall be made in accordance with this
subparagraph and subparagraphs &#147;(d)&#148; and &#147;(e)&#148; below and shall be determined by
comparing the prevailing fixed or base rental rate payable under leases
(collectively, &#147;Comparable Leases&#148;) that have actually been entered into (the &#147;Prevailing
Rental Rate&#148;) as of the Determination Date, for space in buildings within a
twenty-five (25) mile radius of the Premises of comparable quality and age to
the Premises (collectively, &#147;Comparable Buildings&#148;).&#160; The entire Premises shall be taken into
account in determining Fair Market Rental Value, irrespective of whether Tenant
utilizes or intends to utilize such space, including but not limited to any
mezzanine space.&#160; In determining the
Prevailing Rental Rate appropriate consideration shall be given to the 1.89%
annual rent increases hereunder during the applicable Renewal Term and the
economic terms of Comparable Leases, including but not limited to, lease term,
base years, escalations, operating expenses, taxes, and distinctions between &#147;gross&#148;
and &#147;net&#148; leases, the date the particular rent rate under consideration became
or is to become effective, and all other terms and conditions of this Sublease
which are applicable to the applicable Renewal Term.&#160; In addition in the event that any
improvements made by Tenant increase the square footage of the building on the
Premises, an appropriate reduction shall be made to the Fair Market Rental
Value as if such square footage had not been added to the building on the
Premises.&#160; All of the foregoing matters
shall constitute the criteria (the &#147;Criteria&#148;) for determining the Fair Market
Rental Value.&#160; When applying the Criteria,
only leases, renewals and expansions which have been executed within the 12
months prior o the Determination Date shall be taken into consideration.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;Owner and
Tenant shall endeavor to agree as to the amount of the Fair Market Rental Value
for the Premises pursuant to the provisions of subparagraph (c) above, during
the fifteen (15) day period following the Determination Date.&#160; In the event that Owner and Tenant cannot
agree as to the amount of the Fair Market Rental Value within such fifteen (15)
day period following the Determination Date, then Owner or Tenant may initiate
the appraisal process provided for herein by giving notice to that effect to
the other, and the party so initiating the appraisal process (such party
hereinafter referred to as the &#147;Initiating Party&#148;) shall specify in such notice
the name and address of the person designated to act as an arbitrator on its
behalf.&#160; Within fifteen (15) days after
the designation of such arbitrator, the other party (hereinafter referred to as
the &#147;Other Party&#148;) shall give notice to the Initiating Party specifying the
name and address of the person designated to act as an appraiser on its
behalf.&#160; If the Other Party fails to
notify the Initiating Party of the appointment of its appraiser within the time
above specified, then the appointment of the second appraiser shall be made in
the same manner as hereinafter provided for the appointment of a third
appraiser in a case where the two appraisers appointed hereunder and the
parties are unable to agree upon such appointment.&#160; The two appraisers so chosen shall meet
within twenty (20) days after the second appraiser is appointed hereunder and
the parties are unable to agree upon such appointment.&#160; The two appraisers so chosen shall meet
within twenty (20) days after the second appraiser is appointed and attempt to
reach an agreement on the Fair Market Rental Value for the Premises and if,
within twenty (20) days after the second appraiser is appointed, the two
appraisers shall not agree, they shall together appoint a third appraiser.&#160; In the event they are unable to agree upon
such appointment within thirty (30) days after the appointment of the second
appraiser, the third appraiser shall be selected by the parties themselves if
they can agree thereon within a further period of ten (10) days.&#160; If the parties do not so agree on the
appointment of the third appraiser, then either party, on behalf of both and on
notice to the other, may request such appointment by the American Arbitration
Association (or organization successor thereto) in accordance with its rules
then prevailing or if the American Arbitration Association (or such successor
organization) shall fail to appoint said third appraiser within twenty (20)
days after such request is made, then either party may apply on notice to the
other, to the Superior Court, Mercer County, New Jersey (or any other court
having jurisdiction and exercising functions similar to those now exercised by
said Court) for the appointment of such third appraiser.&#160; The determination of Fair Market Value made
by the third appraiser appointed pursuant hereto shall be made within twenty
(20) days after such appointment.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='10',FILE='C:\JMS\ctaft\04-13437-3\task258213\13437-3-kd.htm',USER='ctaft',CD='Dec 20 12:24 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;If a third
appraiser is selected, Fair Market Rental Value shall be the average of the
determination of Fair Market Rental Value made by the third appraiser and the
determination of Fair Market Rental Value made by the appraiser whose
determination of Fair Market Value is nearest to that of the third appraiser.&#160; Such average shall be binding and conclusive
upon Owner and Tenant.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;Each party
shall pay the fees and expenses of the one of the two original appraisers
appointed by or for such party, and the fees and expenses of the third
appraiser and all other expenses (not including the attorneys fees, witness
fees and similar expenses of the parties which shall be borne separately by
each of the parties) of the appraisal process shall be borne by the parties
equally.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;All
appraisers selected or appointed pursuant to this Section 16 shall (A) be
independent qualified MAI appraisers (B) have no right, power or authority to
alter or modify the provisions of this Agreement, (C) utilize the definition of
Fair Market Rental Value hereinabove set forth above, (D) be registered in the
State of New Jersey if such State provides for or requires such registration,
and (E) have at least ten (10) years experience in the leasing and renting of
industrial/office space in similar properties in Central New Jersey.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ASSIGNMENT AND SUBLETTING</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">:</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding anything
contained in the Master Lease to the contrary, with respect to any period prior
to the Attornment Date or the Commencement of any Renewal Term, Owner hereby
waives, for the benefit of Sublandlord and Tenant, any requirement in the
Master Lease requiring the deposit with Owner of an Assignment Security Deposit
or Sublet Security Deposit (as such terms are defined in the Master Lease) or
the consent of Owner to any assignment of the Sublease or further sub-subletting
of the Premises.&#160; Effective as of any
Attornment Date or the commencement of any Renewal Term, if Tenant has so
assigned the Sublease or further sub-sublet the Premises, or if Tenant
thereafter desires to assign the Sublease or further sub-sublet the Premises,
Tenant shall be required to deposit with Owner an Assignment Security Deposit
or Sublet Security Deposit to the extent same would be required under the
Master Lease, provided, however, that the amount of such Assignment Security
Deposit or Sublet Security Deposit, as applicable, shall be only based upon the
then current base rent under the Sublease and not on the full Basic Rent set
forth in the Master Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[REMAINDER OF PAGE IS INTENTIONALLY BLANK]</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">STATE OF NY)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">COUNTY OF WESTCHESTER)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On the 6 day of December,
in the year 2004 before me, the undersigned, personally appeared Kenneth Traub
personally known to me or proved to me on the basis of satisfactory evidence to
be the individual(s) whose name(s) is (are) subscribed to the within instrument
and acknowledged to me that he/she/they executed the same in his/her/their
capacity(ies), and that by his/her/their signature(s) on the instrument, the
individual(s), or the person upon behalf of which the individual(s) acted,
executed the instrument.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  4/1/06</font></p>

 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">STATE OF NEW YORK)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">COUNTY OF NEW YORK)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On the 6 day of December,
in the year 2004 before me, the undersigned, personally appeared Thomas
Zacharias personally known to me or proved to me on the basis of satisfactory
evidence to be the individual(s) whose name(s) is (are) subscribed to the
within instrument and acknowledged to me that he/she/they executed the same in
his/her/their capacity(ies), and that by his/her/their signature(s) on the
instrument, the individual(s), or the person upon behalf of which the
individual(s) acted, executed the instrument.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EXHIBIT A</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Premises</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">All
that certain lot, piece or parcel of land, with the buildings and improvements
thereon erected, situate, lying and being in the Township of Washington, County
of Mercer, State of New Jersey:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">BEGINNING
at a point in the proposed Easterly right of way line of West Manor Way (40
feet from centerline) said point being located the following two (2) courses
from the intersection of the southeasterly right of way line of New Jersey
Turnpike (300 feet wide) with the Easterly right of way line of West Manor Way
(50 feet wide) and from said intersection running;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 72.7pt;text-indent:-36.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Southerly
distant 3202.78 feet along the Easterly right of way line of West Manor Way (50
feet wide) to a point; thence</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 72.7pt;text-indent:-36.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>South
54 degrees 52 minutes 51 seconds East along the common line between Tax Map
Lots 19 and 20 in Block 41, 15.00 feet to a point and place of beginning and
running thence;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>North
34 degrees 24 minutes 41 seconds East along the proposed Easterly right of way
line of West Manor Way, 820.19 feet to a point of curvature; thence</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Northeasterly
along a new line through Lot 19 in Block 41, along a curve to the right having
a radius of 40.00 feet and an arc length of 62.83 feet to a point of tangency;
thence</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>South
55 degrees 35 minutes 19 seconds East along same, 245.00 feet to a point;
thence</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>South
57 degrees 44 minutes 10 seconds East still along same, 200.14 feet to a point;
thence</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>South
55 degrees 35 minutes 19 seconds East still along same, 168.13 feet to a point;
thence</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>South
34 degrees 24 minutes 41 seconds West still along same, 875.76 feet to a point;
thence</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>North
54 degrees 52 minutes 51 seconds West along the common line between Tax Map
Lots 19 and 20 in Block 41,653.18 feet to the true point and place of
BEGINNING.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Being
known as Lot 19.02 in Block 41 on the Tax map.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">TOGETHER
WITH the benefits as contained in that certain Cross Easement Agreement
recorded in Deed Book 3186, page 024.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<body lang="EN-US" style="text-justify-trim:punctuation;">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Exhibit 10.3</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">RECORDING REQUESTED BY AND<br>
WHEN RECORDED MAIL TO:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 4.2in .0001pt 0in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A.<br>
Commercial Mortgage Servicing<br>
1320 Willow Pass Road, Suite 210<br>
Concord, CA 94520</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .2in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Loan No.: 70-0200685</font></p>

<div align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">

<hr size="1" width="100%" noshade color="black" align="center">

</font></div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(Space
Above For Recorder&#146;s Use)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .3in;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SUBORDINATION, NON-DISTURBANCE AND
ATTORNMENT AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:.15in .05in .0001pt 0in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">This
SUBORDINATION, NON-DISTURBANCE AND ATTORNMENT AGREEMENT (&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Agreement</font></b>&#148;)<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> </font></b>is made as of December 14, 2004, by
and between AMERICAN BANK NOTE HOLOGRAPHICS, INC., a Delaware corporation (&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Subtenant</font></b>&#148;)<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">, </font></b>and LASALLE BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION,
FORMERLY KNOWN AS LASALLE NATIONAL BANK, AS TRUSTEE FOR MORGAN STANLEY CAPITAL
I INC., COMMERCIAL MORTGAGE SECURITIES INC., COMMERCIAL MORTGAGE PASS-THROUGH
CERTIFICATES, SERIES 1999-WF1 (&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Lender</font></b>&#148;)<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">,
</font></b>with reference to the following facts and intentions of the
parties:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:23.4pt 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">R</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;"> <u>E</u>  <u>C</u>  <u>I</u>  <u>T</u>  <u>A</u>  <u>L</u>  <u>S</u></font></b></p>

<p style="margin:.15in .2in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">A.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">More Applied Four (DE) LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Owner</font></b>&#148;)<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> </font></b>is the owner of the land and
improvements commonly known as 2 Applegate Drive, Robbinsville, New Jersey, and
more specifically described in <u>Exhibit A</u> attached hereto </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.2pt;">(&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Property</font></b>&#148;)<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> </font></b></font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.2pt;">and the
owner of the Landlord&#146;s interest in the lease identified in Recital B</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;"> below.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .1in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">B.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">APW North America, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">APW</font></b>&#148;)<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">, </font></b>and Owner, as successor in
interest to Power (DE) QRS 14-34, Inc., a Delaware corporation, are parties to
that certain Deed of Lease Agreement dated as of May 30, 2000, as amended by
that certain First Amendment to Deed of Lease dated July 31, 2000, as amended
by that certain Second Amendment to Deed of Lease dated October 31, 2001, and
as amended by that certain Third Amendment to Deed of Lease dated December 14,&nbsp;2004
(as amended, the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Master Lease</font></b>&#148;)<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">, </font></b>pursuant to which Owner leases the Property, among
other locations, to APW.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .3in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">C.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Subtenant and APW are parties to that certain Sublease dated as of
December 14,</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.2pt;"> 2004</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;"> pursuant to which APW subleases the Property to Subtenant.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">D.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Owner is indebted to Lender under a promissory note in the original
principal amount of $11,070,524, which note is secured by, among other things,
a mortgage encumbering the Property, dated October 31, 2001 and recorded on
November 7, 2001 with the Office of the County Clerk of Mercer County, New
Jersey in Mortgage Book 6391, at Page 47. Owner</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='1',FILE='C:\JMS\ctaft\04-13437-3\task258213\13437-3-ke-1.htm',USER='ctaft',CD='Dec 20 12:26 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .05in .0001pt 40.5pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.3pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">is also obligated to Lender pursuant to a guaranty
relating to a $6,429,477 loan made by</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Lender&#146;s predecessor in interest to an affiliate of Owner, which
guaranty is secured by a</font> second mortgage encumbering the Property, dated
October 31, 2001 and recorded on <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">November 7,
2001 with the Office of the County Clerk of Mercer County, New Jersey in</font>
<font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Mortgage Book 6391, at Page 118. The
aforementioned mortgages are individually and</font> collectively referred to
herein as the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Mortgage</font></b>&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .05in .0001pt 40.5pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">E.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Pursuant to
that certain Subordination, Non-Disturbance, Attornment, Renewal and Option <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">to Purchase Agreement dated as of December 14,
2004 between Owner and Subtenant (the</font>  <font style="letter-spacing:-.05pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Sublease SNDA</font></b>&#148;)<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">, </font></b></font><font style="letter-spacing:-.05pt;">the
parties thereto have agreed, among other things, that if the Master</font>  <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Lease is terminated prior to the expiration or
termination of the Sublease, the Sublease will</font> become a direct lease
between Owner and Subtenant. The Sublease, as modified by the Sublease SNDA is
referred to herein as the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Lease</font></b>&#148;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">.</font></b></font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .05in .0001pt 40.5pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">F.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As a condition
to the Lease, Subtenant has requested that Lender make certain agreements with
Subtenant, as set forth below, and Lender is willing to make such agreements
with <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Subtenant if Subtenant furnishes
certain assurances to, and makes certain agreements with, </font>Lender, as set
forth below.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 3.6in .0001pt 0in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">THEREFORE, the parties agree as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 3.6in .0001pt 0in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 3.6in .0001pt 0in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">SUBORDINATION.</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .25in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.45in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;">1.1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Prior Lien.</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;"> </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Mortgage,
and any modifications, renewals or extensions <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">thereof,
shall unconditionally be and at all times remain a lien or charge on the</font>
Property prior and superior to the Lease.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .05in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.45in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;">1.2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Entire Agreement.</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;"> </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Agreement
shall be the whole agreement and only agreement with regard to the
subordination of the Lease to the lien or charge of <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">the Mortgage, and shall supersede and cancel, but only insofar as would
affect the</font> priority between the Mortgage and the Lease, any prior
agreements as to such <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">subordination,
including, without limitation, those provisions, if any, contained in</font>
the Lease which provide for the subordination of the Lease to a deed or deeds
of trust, a mortgage or mortgages, a deed or deeds to secure debt or a trust
indenture or trust indentures.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.45in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;">1.3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Disbursements.</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;"> </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Lender, in
making disbursements pursuant to the Note, the Mortgage or any loan agreements
with respect to the Property, is under no obligation or duty to, nor has Lender
represented that it will, see to the application of such proceeds by the person
or persons to whom Lender disburses such proceeds, and any application or use
of such proceeds for purposes other than those provided for in such agreement
or agreements shall not defeat this Agreement to subordinate in whole or in
part.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .05in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.45in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;">1.4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Subordination.</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;"> </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Subtenant intentionally and
unconditionally waives, relinquishes</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> and subordinates all of
Subtenant&#146;s right, title and interest in and to the Property, to the lien of
the Mortgage.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\JMS\ctaft\04-13437-3\task258213\13437-3-ke-1.htm',USER='ctaft',CD='Dec 20 12:26 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;">2. &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NON-DISTURBANCE AND ATTORNMENT.</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .1in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;">2.1.&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Non-Disturbance.</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;"> </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in the Lease, so
long as there shall exist no breach, default or event of default (beyond any
period given to Subtenant in the Lease to cure such default) on the part of
Subtenant under the Lease at the time of any judicial or non -judicial
foreclosure of the Mortgage or deed in lieu thereof or at any time Lender (or
its designee or successors) otherwise acquires title to the Property, Lender
agrees that the leasehold interest of Subtenant under the Lease shall not be
terminated or otherwise disturbed by reason of such foreclosure, deed in lieu
thereof or other acquisition of the Property (and Subtenant shall not be named
as a defendant in any such foreclosure action), but rather the Lease shall
continue in full force and effect and Lender shall recognize and accept
Subtenant as Subtenant under the Lease subject to the provisions of the Lease
including, without limitation, all of the terms of the Sublease SNDA which
amend the Sublease.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;">2.2.&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Attornment.</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;"> </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in the Lease, should
title to the Property and Owner&#146;s interest in the Lease be transferred to
Lender or any other person or entity (&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">New Owner</font></b>&#148;)<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> </font></b>by, or in lieu of judicial or non-judicial foreclosure
of the Mortgage (collectively, a &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Transfer</font></b>&#148;)<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">,
</font></b>Subtenant <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">agrees, for the
benefit of New Owner and effective immediately and automatically</font> upon the
occurrence of any such Transfer, that: (a) Subtenant shall pay to New <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Owner all rental payments required to be made by
Subtenant pursuant to the terms</font> of the Lease for the remainder of the
Lease term; (b) Subtenant shall be bound to New Owner in accordance with all of
the provisions of the Lease for the remainder of the Lease term; (c) Subtenant
hereby attorns to New Owner as its landlord, such attornment to be effective
and self-operative without the execution <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">of
any further instrument; (d) New Owner shall not be liable for any default of
any</font>  <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">prior landlord under the Lease,
including, without limitation, Owner, except where</font> such default is
continuing at the time New Owner acquires title to the leased <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">premises and New Owner fails to cure same after
receiving notice thereof; (e) New</font> Owner shall not be subject to any
offsets or defenses which Subtenant may have against any prior landlord under
the Lease, including, without limitation, Owner, except where such offsets or
defenses arise out of a default of the prior landlord <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">which is continuing at the time New Owner acquires title to the leased
premises and</font> New Owner fails to cure same after receiving notice
thereof; and (f) New Owner <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">shall not be
liable for any obligations of landlord arising under the Lease following</font>
any subsequent transfer of the title to the leased premises by New Owner.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;">2.3.&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[Intentionally Deleted]</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .15in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;">2.4.&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Option to
Purchase; Right of First Offer.</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;"> </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The provisions
of Section 15 of the Sublease, Section 8 and Section 13 of the Sublease SNDA, and
any other provision of the Lease notwithstanding (collectively, the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Option and
ROFO Rights</font></b>&#148;)<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">, </font></b>Subtenant
acknowledges and agrees as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='3',FILE='C:\JMS\ctaft\04-13437-3\task258213\13437-3-ke-1.htm',USER='ctaft',CD='Dec 20 12:26 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in .05in .0001pt .95in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.05in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .05in .0001pt .95in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.05in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Without
limiting the generality of any provision of this Agreement, the Option and ROFO
Rights are subject to the provisions of the Mortgage and each of the other
documents, instruments and agreements executed in connection with the
above-described indebtedness of Owner and Owner&#146;s affiliate to Lender (collectively,
the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Debt</font></b>&#148;)<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">;</font></b></font></p>

<p style="margin:.15in .05in .0001pt .95in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.05in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Subtenant shall not
have the right to exercise any of the Option and ROFO Rights as a result of the
appointment of a receiver, the foreclosure of the Mortgage, or the Transfer of
the Property in lieu of judicial or non-judicial foreclosure of the Mortgage;
and</font></p>

<p style="margin:.15in .05in .0001pt .95in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.05in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Subtenant shall not
have the right to exercise any option to purchase the Property included in the
Option and ROFO Rights unless and until the Debt has been indefeasibly paid in
full or unless the Debt will be paid in full contemporaneously with the closing
of the acquisition of Property in connection with Subtenant&#146;s exercise of such
option to purchase.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="letter-spacing:.5pt;"> </font></font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[Intentionally Deleted]</font></p>

<p style="margin:.15in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="letter-spacing:.5pt;"> </font></font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[Intentionally Deleted]</font></p>

<p style="margin:.15in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;"> </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">MISCELLANEOUS.</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:.15in .05in .0001pt .95in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.45in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;">5.1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Heirs, Successors and Assigns.</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;"> </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The covenants
herein shall be binding upon, and<br>
inure to the benefit of, the heirs, successors and assigns of the parties
hereto. Whenever necessary or appropriate to give logical meaning to a
provision of this Agreement, the term &#147;Owner&#148; shall be deemed to mean the then
current owner of the Property and the landlord&#146;s interest in the Lease.</font></p>

<p style="margin:.15in .2in .0001pt .95in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.45in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;">5.2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Addresses; Request for Notice.</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;"> </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">All notices and other
communications that are</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> required or permitted to be given to a party under
this Agreement shall be in writing and shall be sent to such party, either by
personal delivery, by overnight delivery service, by certified first class
mail, return receipt requested, or by facsimile transmission, to the address or
facsimile number below. All such notices and communications shall be effective
upon receipt of such delivery or facsimile transmission.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:.15in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:.15in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="margin:.15in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:.15in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 16.2pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The
addresses and facsimile numbers of the parties shall be:</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="48%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:48.68%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Subtenant:</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.64%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="48%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:48.68%;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .95in;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">provided,</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> <u>however,</u>
any party shall have the right to change its address for notice <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">hereunder by the giving of written notice thereof
to the other party in the manner set</font> forth in this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:.15in .25in .0001pt .95in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.45in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;">5.3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Counterparts.</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;"> </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">This Agreement may be executed
in two or more counterparts,</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> each of which shall be deemed an original
and all of which together shall constitute and be construed as one and the same
instrument.</font></p>

<p style="margin:.15in .05in .0001pt .95in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.45in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;">5.4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Section Headings.</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;"> </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section
headings in this Agreement are for convenience only and are not to be construed
as part of this Agreement or in any way limiting or applying the provisions
hereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:.15in 0in .0001pt .95in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.45in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;">5.5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Attorneys&#146; Fees.</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;"> </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If any legal
action, suit or proceeding is commenced between Subtenant and Lender regarding
their respective rights and obligations under this Agreement, the prevailing
party shall be entitled to recover, in addition to damages or other relief,
costs and expenses, attorneys&#146; fees and court costs (including, without
limitation, expert witness fees). As used herein, the term &#147;prevailing party&#148;
shall mean the party which obtains the principal relief it has sought, whether
by compromise settlement or judgment. If the party which commenced or
instituted the action, suit or proceeding shall dismiss or discontinue it
without the concurrence of the other party, such other party shall be deemed
the prevailing party.</font></p>

<p style="margin:.15in .8in .0001pt .45in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.45in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.5pt;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">INCORPORATION.</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;"> </font></b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Exhibit A,</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;"> the Owner&#146;s Consent is attached hereto and</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> incorporated herein by this
reference.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">[REMAINDER OF PAGE INTENTIONALLY LEFT BLANK]</font></b></p>

  <td width="23%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:23.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 2.6in .0001pt 0in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="23%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:23.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 2.6in .0001pt 0in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 2.6in .0001pt 0in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .65in .0001pt 0in;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">IT IS RECOMMENDED THAT, PRIOR TO THE EXECUTION OF THIS <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">AGREEMENT, THE PARTIES CONSULT WITH THEIR
ATTORNEYS WITH </font>RESPECT HERETO.</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ALL
SIGNATURES MUST BE ACKNOWLEDGED.</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">OWNER&#146;S
CONSENT</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:.15in .2in .0001pt 0in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The undersigned, which owns
the Property and the landlord&#146;s interest in the Lease, hereby <font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">consents to the execution of the foregoing
SUBORDINATION, NON-DISTURBANCE AND</font> ATTORNMENT AGREEMENT, and to
implementation of the agreements and transactions provided for therein.</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">My commission expires:</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="236" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:176.65pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3/3/07</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  OF NEW YORK</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="15" height="18" valign="top" style="height:13.7pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.45pt;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.45pt;">ss.</font></p>

Applied Four (DE) QRS 14-75 Inc. a Delaware Corp and acknowledged the foregoing
instrument to be his/her free act and deed and the free act and deed of such
corporation, in said capacity, before me,</font></p>
